description: Gives the biography of a Super Hero

parameters.name: hero_name
parameters.description: The name of the Super Hero

parameters.name: hero_powers
parameters.description: The coma separated list of powers of the Super Hero
parameters.defaultValue: Agility, Longevity, Marksmanship, Natural Weapons, Stealth, Super Strength, Weapons Master

parameters.name: hero_level
parameters.description: A number representing the level of the Super Hero
